entry.title: Spirtual Awakening
entry.summary:
Author: Lady_Stardust1979

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,376Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: "With the lights now turned on, Eddie had a clear view of the living room and how it was set up, with the furniture pushed to the sides of the room, and an absolute mess made of the centre with candles, rocks, and even - was that incense?¬† ‚ÄúSo, if I said that it looks like you‚Äôre performing an exorcism, or something like a seance, I would be wrong in that assumption?‚Äù Eddie crossed his arms, leaning back against the wall.¬† Buck opened his mouth to protest, paused, then pursed his lips. ‚ÄúYou would be very slightly correct in that assumption.‚Äù ‚ÄúRight,‚Äù Eddie nodded his head. ‚ÄúWhy?‚Äù Chris perked up then, nodding sagely whilst replying. ‚ÄúThere was no wifi.‚Äù¬†" ¬† ________ ¬† With Halloween right around the corner and the wifi down from the damages caused by the meteors raining down on everyone from the geomagnetic storm, Buck and Chris have to entertain themselves whilst Eddie is once again hanging out with his new bestie boo Hen. What better way to pass the time than to banish Eddie's hetrosexuality away from the universe to keep the women of LA safe and sound?

He could‚Äôve‚Äîno, should‚Äôve lost his leg. He probably would‚Äôve if they hadn‚Äôt gotten the truck lifted when they had.So, it‚Äôs fine. It‚Äôs a small flare-up of pain.Eddie, his unbelievably stubborn boyfriend, does not seem to agree.‚ÄúSit, Buckley,‚Äù Eddie instructs, leaving very little room for argument. Unfortunately for Eddie, Buck would argue even if there were absolutely no room for it.‚ÄúEddie, c‚Äômon, I‚Äôm just finishing the dishes‚Äî‚ÄùSuddenly, Eddie is right behind him, large hand landing on the small of his back. Eddie‚Äôs shorter than Buck is, but his hands‚ÄîJesus Christ, his hands‚Äîare bigger, with long, thick fingers that drive Buck crazy with their efficiency and competence. Eddie‚Äôs other hand grabs Buck by the chin, tilting his head to the side and down, their eyes locking.‚ÄúBuck, that wasn‚Äôt a suggestion. Sit your ass down.‚ÄùORBuck tries ignoring a pain flare-up. entry.title: The Perfect Halloween
entry.summary:
Author: Dolly_mae_17

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 923Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: He‚Äôs looking at Alvin And The Chipmunks on Pinterest sitting criss-cross on his bed when he feels the bed sinking in where Eddies just sat, followed by a small kiss on the top of his head.‚ÄúWhatcha doin,‚Äù Eddie said. By this time Buck is scrambling to close his laptop before Eddie can mention anything.‚ÄúNope,‚Äù Eddie says, grabbing the laptop from his hands. ‚ÄúWait, no th-‚Äù A wide smile lands on Eddie's face ‚ÄúAre you looking at matching costumes for halloween?!?!?!‚Äù‚ÄúUmm, yeah‚Ä¶.. If you don't want to, we don't have to.‚ÄùBefore Buck can even notice, Eddie is so close he can hear him breathing. ‚Äú What are you talking about?‚Äù Eddie says with his worried face.A soft hand lands on Bucks Knee. Buck has always loved Eddie's soft hands, He loves the way they fit so perfectly in his.‚ÄúOf course I want to do a matching Halloween costume with you.‚Äù Eddie said.It sounded like it flowed out of his mouth. It felt so natural.‚ÄúReally?‚Äù Buck said. He‚Äôs never had a matching Halloween costume with anyone.ever.‚ÄúReally‚Äù Eddie said in a comforting voice, as he softly squeezed Buck's knee.¬† OR¬† Buck and Eddie's first halloween together as a couple.

entry.summary:
Author: magnoliamica

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,258Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 240

Summary: As Eddie leaves the kitchen, at the end of the kitchen fight in 8x17, after saying "I don't know, Buck. I wasn't there." instead of letting Eddie leave, Buck says "you're here now." Things snowball from there. ___________________ ‚ÄúWhat fucking difference does it make, Buck, hmm?‚Äù Eddie asks, and grabs a fistful of Buck‚Äôs rust-colored zip pullover, yanks him closer, even closer than they‚Äôd been with his finger in Buck‚Äôs face. His fist at Buck's chest is not tender, no, nor does his touch feel filled with care. This is desperation. And it stirs something desperate in Buck, too‚Äìnot just the fact of Eddie‚Äôs hands rough on him; not just the spike in Eddie‚Äôs pulse under Buck‚Äôs hand, against Eddie‚Äôs skin from the inside out; not just in the way Buck‚Äôs hand is now pushed up higher, off of Eddie‚Äôs shoulder, almost cupping the back of his neck; not just how close they are, the way that he can almost feel the rise and fall of Eddie‚Äôs chest with his own‚Äìbut the way Buck can feel the heat of his own name snapped from Eddie‚Äôs mouth, Eddie‚Äôs breath against his lips. What difference does it make? The difference is, Buck couldn‚Äôt kiss Eddie when he was in El Paso.

entry.title: Unconditional Love
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,846Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Evan is Bobby‚Äôs biological son from a previous marriage; Athena is his stepmother)This story is set six months after a major virus exposure. Eddie has returned home from Texas to help out Chimney, who is temporarily stepping in as captain of the 118 firehouse while the actual captain, Bobby, is in a medically induced coma fighting the virus.During the six months apart, Eddie and Evan grew incredibly close, leading to a secret relationship between them. Evan is struggling significantly with his father's condition, spending almost all his time at the hospital, barely sleeping or eating. Eddie is actively trying to take care of him, even having to drag Evan out of the hospital to rest.
